text: Gu wo buneŋ zɨn ŋgɨr zav, gu kha kamen nde nzuai fhuvara. Zakɨra fhuvara! Gu harigi gumgi gu mbigi kha ŋaara khavgiap, guigira ana mbui, gu ne bun nde nzuai. Gu nden mparav nde nzuai. Nde maaŋ muuŋgip guigira wari won ndavir harigi gumgi gu mbigi ga ndɨɨi tɨva ndi khɨvɨrga, ana guigira bigɨna guar ma.
